channel.title: Help with skillcape emotes
channel.description: okay i have all the skill cape emotes and stuff and all the boleons and etc... and even client sided in the emote list it says skillcape emote but the button in emote tab dont show up???? i have the models for actual skillcapes emotes in the raw and stuff but im not shur if the source had a skillcape command is ther anyway to tell what the gfx/animation code is for the emotes?? or how could i use the emotes
